mapper.select: SELECT bk_num, ck_in, ck_out, night, hotelName, roomNumber, roomName, maxGuest, fee, uid, request, pay, pay_st FROM bookTable ORDER BY bk_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookTable (bk_num, ck_in, ck_out, night, hotelName, roomNumber, roomName, maxGuest, fee, uid, request, pay) VALUES ((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS DATE FROM DUAL), #{ck_in}, #{ck_out}, #{night}, #{hotelName}, #{roomNumber}, #{roomName}, #{maxGuest}, #{fee}, #{uid}, #{request}, #{pay})
